alert.note: Alert for Estill; Jackson; Lee; Owsley; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 07 at 11:27AM EDT until May 07 at 11:45AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN OWSLEY...SOUTH CENTRAL ESTILL...NORTHERN JACKSON... NORTHWESTERN BREATHITT...LEE AND SOUTHWESTERN WOLFE COUNTIES... At 1126 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Campton to Mount Olive to Blanton Flats, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Beattyville around 1130 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Fincastle, Monica, Athol and Delvinta. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Heavy rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
